articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.title: I reviewed the iPhone Air. Here’s 3 things I discovered - Digital Trends
articles.description: The iPhone Air is a marvel in the hand thanks to its ultra-thin body, but it also requires accepting considerable compromises in battery and camera. Yet, it may not matter as much. Here's three things I discovered while reviewing the iPhone Air.
